Send email about Publishable¶

This package offers nicely wrapped custom send email action over Publishable models. Installation is very easy.

How to install¶

Simply add ella_toolkit.publishable.send_email to your INSTALLED_APPS and make sure that ella_toolkit.publishable.send_email.urls is loaded. You can enforce it your ``urls.py` in the following fashion:

from ella.utils.installedapps import call_modules
call_modules(auto_discover=('urls',))

That’s really everything you need to do to run the custom application.

Template customization¶

You would probably want to use a customized template for showing the form or the email. It’s easy to do, just override the template by creating it in these locations:

  • /templates/send_email/email.html
  • /templates/send_email/form.html
